subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Tom Glavine doesn’t get to 300 career wins this season, the Mets aren’t going anywhere — not to the World Series, not to the National League Championship Series, not to the playoffs period.
snippet: If Tom Glavine doesn’t get to 300 career wins this season, the Mets aren’t going anywhere — not to the World Series, not to the National League Championship Series, not to the playoffs period.
